overview: The Asian sensation gets dirty just for you! There are slim, stacked hotties and then there is Hitomi. The Japanese J-cupper was an instant favorite when she debuted in 2011, but you will get to know the world's busiest Asian natural better than you ever thought possible in this special movie. In nine scenes that range from fun in the sun to covered in cum, Hitomi lets it all hang out. Because she is a true work of art, Hitomi also gives new meaning to the term "skillful outfit" when the luckiest artist in the world paints a form-fitting red dress onto her perfect body. And we get to watch her wash the paint off too! This is Hitomi as you've never seen her before: she's never been better or sexier!
title: Bad Girl Hitomi
